name: AffiliateWP – Affiliate QR Codes
author: Sandhills Development, LLC

sections.description:
With the Affiliate QR Codes official free add-on, your affiliates’ URLs are automatically generated into a PNG image file. Each affiliate can easily share their image in emails, on the web, on print materials, or via social media. These QR codes have referral tracking functionality built right in! This allows your affiliates to more reliably share referral links on mobile devices.

QR codes in the Affiliate Area

Once installed and activated, within the Affiliate Area a QR code will be displayed in the Affiliate URLs tab. Your affiliates can click on the preview image to view and download a ready-to-share PNG file that is optimized for both scanning clarity and small file size. The QR code contains their referral URL.

QR codes in the Affiliate Portal

If you are using the Affiliate Portal pro add-on, a QR code will be displayed in the Referral URL section of the Affiliate URLs page. Your affiliates can click on the QR code to download it.

This plugin requires AffiliateWP v2.7 or newer in order to function.

What is AffiliateWP?

AffiliateWP provides a complete affiliate management system for your WordPress website that seamlessly integrates with all major WordPress e-commerce and membership platforms. It aims to provide everything you need in a simple, clean, easy to use system that you will love to use.
sections.installation:
1. Unpack the entire contents of this plugin zip file into your wp-content/plugins/ folder locally
  2. Upload to your site
  3. Navigate to wp-admin/plugins.php on your site (your WP Admin plugin page)
  4. Activate this plugin
  5. Navigate in the WP Admin to Affiliates > Settings > QR Codes
  6. Check the box to Enable affiliate QR codes

OR you can just install it with WordPress by going to Plugins >> Add New >> and type this plugin’s name
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Fixed: The QR image URL getter only works for the current affiliate

1.0.2

  • Fixed: Bootstrap the add-on for AffiliateWP 2.7+ compatibility

1.0.1

  • Improved: Switch QR code image format to PNG
  • Improved: QR code link should open in a new tab
  • Improved: Leverage Image_Control if available for display in the Affiliate Portal

1.0.0

  • First release

short_description: Allows affiliates to save, print, or share their affiliate URL as a QR code.

screenshots.caption: QR code in the Affiliate Area. Note: the Affiliate Area’s layout is mostly determined by your website theme. Pictured here is the WP Astra theme, your site will likely look different.
QR code in the Affiliate Portal.
